name: FENRIR Pirates - Pathbook game
description:
ONLY SPANISH -- This is an interactive book with multiple endings. "Living a Book" is a new approach of interactive books where the reader’s decisions change and trigger new situations and a different ending.

Adventure Fantasy Interactive Pathbook.

-You decide what will happen in the story
-Fantastic music in every scene
-Wonderful images
-An intense history.

"THE LEGEND OF FENRIR" is an adventure Pathbook, adventure, romance and mystery create by Gino Ostuni.

The young pirate returns to his kingdom to fulfill his duty as the successor of his legendary father. He will have to face old traditions of his people, opponents of his reign and the difficult task of fulfilling the promise he left to his brother. Each decision will lead this pirate to discover new lands, ancient cultures, and unsuspected dangers.

Story Gamebook App with images, music, decisions and multiple endings, a great storybook online for people who like to play interactive games where you can choose an adventure of your own.

"THE LEGEND OF FENRIR" is available today, you get to choose the course of the story, become the main character, choose your path wisely and discover our multiple endings.


This Interactive Adventure gamebook app is available for iPhone & iPad devices, Download for Free and decide later if you want the full version, This Interactive Book App is published by Living a Book.

LIVING A BOOK, books with decisions and multiple endings, create a unique immersive experience by combining technology and a good read. Our Pathbook apps create the best reading experience ever.

Pathbooks are Interactive Book Apps with images, music, decisions and multiple endings in a diverse book library for all ages.  Not is a gamebook or chat story, not is a game, not is only an ebook, is a PATHBOOK.

Become one of our characters, Choose Wisely!

We’re creating NEW possibilities in the art and craft of storytelling where authors are limited only by their imagination. Get fully immersed in our apps, they’re not just books, a text adventure, games to play over text, interactive games or flash fiction, we call them PATHBOOKS, we are keeping the essence of good reading and we use technology to create a great experience. 

Read a Pathbook and enjoy reading like never before.

This Interactive Book App is published by Living a Book.


LIVING A BOOK
A reading experience

Ordinary people, book lovers, and writers from around the world are writing our books. Be part of this adventure and become the author of your own interactive book. You just need to write the story and Living a Book will design, program and publish it as an application at no cost.
